abstract: The Altria Group is expected to announce the terms of the long-awaited spinoff of its stake in Kraft Foods on Wednesday, and several analysts said they expected Kraft’s shares to decline in the near term. Altria owns more than 88 percent of Kraft, the largest maker of food products in the United States, and is expected to disburse shares among Altria shareholders.
lead_paragraph: The Altria Group is expected to announce the terms of the long-awaited spinoff of its stake in Kraft Foods on Wednesday, and several analysts said they expected Kraft’s shares to decline in the near term. Altria owns more than 88 percent of Kraft, the largest maker of food products in the United States, and is expected to disburse shares among Altria shareholders.

headline.main: Shares of Kraft Foods Expected to Fall After Spinoff From Altria
